title: punnagai onRRE
sahitya:
punnagai onrE pOdumE ihapara virundAgumE marundAgumE un





anupallavi



tannigharillAda sundarat-tOLuDaiyAi vaNNamAi mArbamar vanitaiyuDan un





caraNam



niraindu ninrAi asurapAlanaik-kAttiDa parandu shenrAi oru yAnaikku

parindiDa



naDandu shenrAi kanni shApamum aghaTriDa ninaindoru nangaikku aruL

shurandAi



madhyama kaalam



parandu naDandini nondiDa vENDAm padamalar paNiyum aDimai enakkun
